ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:54:15 [Issue ID 4000-315732] urn:comicvine:4000-315732 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:25:17. [Issue ID 920750]
ComicInfo.Summary: The most harrowing epic since the series' inception starts when Snow and Bigby's cub Therese receives a Christmas gift from an unknown admirer. This red plastic boat may hold the key to a deep, disturbing secret that will incite a series of soul-crushing events for the denizens of Fabletown. This 8-issue storyline will boast a backup feature that follows Bufkin's (mis)adventures in Oz painted by fan-favorite Shawn McManus which will be a great entry point for new readers.
